title: It's NOT About the Technology
content: Its about the PEOPLE! Focus on the business processes to improve before even considering buying software.

title: Garbage In, Garbage Out
content: Data quality is the 2nd reason for failure. Ensure your customer data, logs and other performance data is fairly accurate.

title: Stakeholder Participation
content: Absolutely critical! Involve upper management, unions, IT, and especially get the crews to be involved in every step.

title: Right Person for the Right Job
content: Many assign the route supervisors to manage the implementation. They may struggle with the advanced technology and need enough time to really learn it.

title: Don't Sweat the Little Stuff
content: Dealing with large customer databases with a few dubious records, it is better to note them for later versus trying to fix every little problem. Perfection kills progress.

title: Systems Integration
content: You need frequently updated data, which means you must integrate the systems with GIS, ERP, work orders, CRM, billing, etc. Plan for this well in advance.
